thread.title: Rosie O’Donnell Goes Full Bannon in New Twitter Profile Pic
thread.title_full: Rosie O’Donnell Goes Full Bannon in New Twitter Profile Pic

author: Josh Feldman
title: Rosie O’Donnell Goes Full Bannon in New Twitter Profile Pic
text:
Rosie O’Donnell Goes Full Bannon in New Twitter Profile Pic by Josh Feldman | 9:26 pm, February 9th, 2017 
After the report this week that President Trump was bothered by how a woman ( Melissa McCarthy ) played Sean Spicer on SNL , a lot of people have come up with other suggestions for women who could play other Trump administration roles. 
The one actress many have agreed on wanting to see is none other than Rosie O’Donnell , due to her long-running feud with the man who is currently the President of the United States. O’Donnell said she would be up for playing Steve Bannon , and she has a new profile picture to reflect her commitment:
